00090 static double SIGN (double a, double b)
00091 {
00092     return b > 0 ? fabs (a) : -fabs (a);
00093 }

00141 void svd
00142 (
00143         const Array2D< double >& amatA,
00144         Array2D< double >& umatA,
00145         Array2D< double >& vmatA,
00146         Array  < double >& w // singular values
00147 )
00148 {
00149         unsigned m = amatA.rows( ); /* rows */
00150         unsigned n = amatA.cols( ); /* cols */
00151         double** const a = amatA.ptrArr( ); /* input matrix */
00152         double **u = umatA.ptrArr( ); /* left vectors */
00153         double **v = vmatA.ptrArr( ); /* right vectors */
00154 
00155     int flag;
00156     unsigned i, its, j, jj, k, l, nm(0);
00157     double anorm, c, f, g, h, s, scale, x, y, z;
00158 
00159         Array< double > rv1( n );
00160 
00161     /* copy A to U */
00162     for (i = 0; i < m; i++)
00163         {
00164         for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00165                 {
00166             u [i] [j] = a [i] [j];
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 
00170     /* householder reduction to bidiagonal form */
00171     g = scale = anorm = 0.0;
00172 
00173     for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00174         {
00175         l = i + 1;
00176         rv1 (i) = scale * g;
00177         g = s = scale = 0.0;
00178 
00179                 if (i < m)
00180                 {
00181                         for (k = i; k < m; k++)
00182                         {
00183                                 scale += fabs (u [k] [i]);
00184                         }
00185 
00186                         if (scale != 0.0)
00187                         {
00188                                 for (k = i; k < m; k++)
00189                                 {
00190                                         u [k] [i] /= scale;
00191                                         s += u [k] [i] * u [k] [i];
00192                                 }
00193 
00194                                 f = u [i] [i];
00195                                 g = -SIGN (sqrt (s), f);
00196                                 h = f * g - s;
00197                                 u [i] [i] = f - g;
00198 
00199                                 for (j = l; j < n; j++)
00200                                 {
00201                                         s = 0.0;
00202                                         for (k = i; k < m; k++)
00203                                         {
00204                                                 s += u [k] [i] * u [k] [j];
00205                                         }
00206 
00207                                         f = s / h;
00208                                         for (k = i; k < m; k++)
00209                                         {
00210                                                 u [k] [j] += f * u [k] [i];
00211                                         }
00212                                 }
00213 
00214                                 for (k = i; k < m; k++)
00215                                 {
00216                                         u [k] [i] *= scale;
00217                                 }
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220 
00221         w( i ) = scale * g;
00222         g = s = scale = 0.0;
00223 
00224         if (i < m && i != n-1)
00225                 {
00226             for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00227                         {
00228                 scale += fabs (u [i] [k]);
00229                         }
00230 
00231                         if (scale != 0.0)
00232                         {
00233                                 for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00234                                 {
00235                                         u [i] [k] /= scale;
00236                                         s += u [i] [k] * u [i] [k];
00237                                 }
00238 
00239                                 f = u [i] [l];
00240                                 g = -SIGN (sqrt(s), f);
00241                                 h = f * g - s;
00242                                 u [i] [l] = f - g;
00243 
00244                                 for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00245                                 {
00246                     rv1( k ) = u [i] [k] / h;
00247                                 }
00248 
00249                                 for (j = l; j < m; j++)
00250                                 {
00251                                         s = 0.0;
00252                                         for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00253                                         {
00254                                                 s += u [j] [k] * u [i] [k];
00255                                         }
00256 
00257                                         for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00258                                         {
00259                                                 u [j] [k] += s * rv1( k );
00260                                         }
00261                                 }
00262 
00263                                 for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00264                                 {
00265                                         u [i] [k] *= scale;
00266                                 }
00267                         }
00268                 }
00269 
00270         anorm = max (anorm, fabs (w( i )) + fabs (rv1( i )));
00271     }
00272 
00273     /* accumulation of right-hand transformations */
00274     for (l = i = n; i--; l--)
00275         {
00276                 if (l < n)
00277                 {
00278                         if (g != 0.0)
00279                         {
00280                                 for (j = l; j < n; j++)
00281                                 {
00282                                         /* double division avoids possible underflow */
00283                                         v [j] [i] = (u [i] [j] / u [i] [l]) / g;
00284                                 }
00285 
00286                                 for (j = l; j < n; j++)
00287                                 {
00288                                         s = 0.0;
00289                                         for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00290                                         {
00291                                                 s += u [i] [k] * v [k] [j];
00292                                         }
00293 
00294                                         for (k = l; k < n; k++)
00295                                         {
00296                                                 v [k] [j] += s * v [k] [i];
00297                                         }
00298                                 }
00299                         }
00300 
00301                         for (j = l; j < n; j++)
00302                         {
00303                                 v [i] [j] = v [j] [i] = 0.0;
00304                         }
00305                 }
00306 
00307                 v [i] [i] = 1.0;
00308                 g = rv1( i );
00309     }
00310 
00311     /* accumulation of left-hand transformations */
00312     for (l = i = min (m, n); i--; l--)
00313         {
00314                 g = w( i );
00315 
00316                 for (j = l; j < n; j++)
00317                 {
00318                         u [i] [j] = 0.0;
00319                 }
00320 
00321                 if (g != 0.0)
00322                 {
00323                         g = 1.0 / g;
00324 
00325                         for (j = l; j < n; j++)
00326                         {
00327                                 s = 0.0;
00328                                 for (k = l; k < m; k++)
00329                                 {
00330                                         s += u [k] [i] * u [k] [j];
00331                                 }
00332 
00333                                 /* double division avoids possible underflow */
00334                                 f = (s / u [i] [i]) * g;
00335 
00336                                 for (k = i; k < m; k++)
00337                                 {
00338                                         u [k] [j] += f * u [k] [i];
00339                                 }
00340                         }
00341 
00342                         for (j = i; j < m; j++)
00343                         {
00344                                 u [j] [i] *= g;
00345                         }
00346                 }
00347                 else
00348                 {
00349                         for (j = i; j < m; j++)
00350                         {
00351                                 u [j] [i] = 0.0;
00352                         }
00353                 }
00354 
00355                 u [i] [i]++;
00356     }
00357 
00358     /* diagonalization of the bidiagonal form */
00359     for (k = n; k--; )
00360         {
00361                 for (its = 1; its <= 30; its++)
00362                 {
00363                         flag = 1;
00364 
00365                         /* test for splitting */
00366 //                      for (l = k + 1; l--; )
00367 /* Thomas Buecher: 
00368         Änderung, die fehlerhaft sein kann, aber Absturz verhindert:
00369         l kann 0 werden --> nm (zwei Zeilen tiefer) wird riesig, da 0-1 auf 
00370         unsigned typ berechnet wird
00371 */
00372                         for (l = k; l > 0; l--)
00373                         {
00374                                 /* rv1 [0] is always zero, so there is no exit */
00375                                 nm = l - 1;
00376 
00377                                 if (fabs (rv1( l )) + anorm == anorm)
00378                                 {
00379                                         flag = 0;
00380                                         break;
00381                                 }
00382 
00383                                 if (fabs (w( nm )) + anorm == anorm)
00384                                 {
00385                                         break;
00386                                 }
00387                         }
00388 
00389                         if (flag)
00390                         {
00391                                 /* cancellation of rv1 [l] if l greater than 0 */
00392                                 c = 0.0;
00393                                 s = 1.0;
00394 
00395                                 for (i = l; i <= k; i++)
00396                                 {
00397                                         f = s * rv1( i );
00398                                         rv1( i ) *= c;
00399 
00400                                         if (fabs (f) + anorm == anorm)
00401                                         {
00402                                                 break;
00403                                         }
00404 
00405                                         g = w( i );
00406                                         h = hypot(f, g);
00407                                         w( i ) = h;
00408                                         h = 1.0 / h;
00409                                         c = g * h;
00410                                         s = -f * h;
00411 
00412                                         for (j = 0; j < m; j++)
00413                                         {
00414                                                 y = u [j] [nm];
00415                                                 z = u [j] [i];
00416                                                 u [j] [nm] = y * c + z * s;
00417                                                 u [j] [i ] = z * c - y * s;
00418                                         }
00419                                 }
00420                         }
00421 
00422                         /* test for convergence */
00423                         z = w( k );
00424 
00425                         if (l == k)
00426                         {
00427                                 if (z < 0.0)
00428                                 {
00429                                         w( k ) = -z;
00430                                         for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00431                                         {
00432                                                 v [j] [k] = -v [j] [k];
00433                                         }
00434                                 }
00435                                 break;
00436                         }
00437 
00438                         if (its == 30)
00439                         {
00440                                 throw k;
00441                         }
00442 
00443                         /* shift from bottom 2 by 2 minor */
00444                         x = w( l );
00445                         nm = k - 1;
00446                         y = w( nm );
00447                         g = rv1( nm );
00448                         h = rv1( k );
00449                         f = ((y - z) * (y + z) + (g - h) * (g + h)) / (2.0 * h * y);
00450                         g = hypot(f, 1.0);
00451                         f = ((x - z) * (x + z) + h * ((y / (f + SIGN (g, f))) - h)) / x;
00452 
00453                         /* next qr transformation */
00454                         c = s = 1.0;
00455 
00456                         for (j = l; j < k; j++)
00457                         {
00458                                 i = j + 1;
00459                                 g = rv1( i );
00460                                 y = w( i );
00461                                 h = s * g;
00462                                 g *= c;
00463                                 z = hypot(f, h);
00464                                 rv1( j ) = z;
00465                                 c = f / z;
00466                                 s = h / z;
00467                                 f = x * c + g * s;
00468                                 g = g * c - x * s;
00469                                 h = y * s;
00470                                 y *= c;
00471 
00472                                 for (jj = 0; jj < n; jj++)
00473                                 {
00474                                         x = v [jj] [j];
00475                                         z = v [jj] [i];
00476                                         v [jj] [j] = x * c + z * s;
00477                                         v [jj] [i] = z * c - x * s;
00478                                 }
00479 
00480                                 z = hypot(f, h);
00481                                 w( j ) = z;
00482 
00483                                 /* rotation can be arbitrary if z is zero */
00484                                 if (z != 0.0)
00485                                 {
00486                                         z = 1.0 / z;
00487                                         c = f * z;
00488                                         s = h * z;
00489                                 }
00490 
00491                                 f = c * g + s * y;
00492                                 x = c * y - s * g;
00493 
00494                                 for (jj = 0; jj < m; jj++)
00495                                 {
00496                                         y = u [jj] [j];
00497                                         z = u [jj] [i];
00498                                         u [jj] [j] = y * c + z * s;
00499                                         u [jj] [i] = z * c - y * s;
00500                                 }
00501                         }
00502 
00503                         rv1( l ) = 0.0;
00504                         rv1( k ) = f;
00505                         w( k ) = x;
00506                 }
00507     }
00508 }

00542 void svd
00543 (
00544     const Array< double >& A,
00545           Array< double >& U,
00546           Array< double >& V,
00547           Array< double >& W
00548 )
00549 {
00550     SIZE_CHECK( A.ndim( ) == 2 && A.dim( 0 ) == A.dim( 1 ) )
00551 
00552         Array2DReference< double > amatL( const_cast< Array< double >& >( A ) );
00553         Array2DReference< double > umatL( U );
00554         Array2DReference< double > vmatL( V );
00555 
00556     U.resize( A.dim( 0 ), A.dim( 1 ) );
00557     V.resize( A.dim( 1 ), A.dim( 1 ) );
00558     W.resize( A.dim( 1 ) );
00559 
00560     svd( amatL, umatL, vmatL, W );
00561     svdsort( umatL, vmatL, W );
00562 }
